basics.description: **Note:** Please refer to the following before installing the solution: • Review the solution [Release Notes](https://github.com/Azure/Azure-Sentinel/blob/master/Solutions/Citrix%20ADC/ReleaseNotes.md) • There may be [known issues](https://aka.ms/sentinelsolutionsknownissues) pertaining to this Solution. The [Citrix ADC](https://www.citrix.com/products/citrix-adc/) (formerly NetScaler) enables you to ingest Citrix ADC logs into Microsoft Sentinel. Refer the [Citrix ADC log collection guide](https://support.citrix.com/article/CTX227560) for more details. **Underlying Microsoft Technologies used:** This solution takes a dependency on the following technologies, and some of these dependencies either may be in [Preview](https://azure.microsoft.com/support/legal/preview-supplemental-terms/) state or might result in additional ingestion or operational costs: a. [Agent-based log collection (Syslog) ](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/sentinel/connect-syslog) **Data Connectors:** 1, **Parsers:** 1 [Learn more about Microsoft Sentinel](https://aka.ms/azuresentinel) | [Learn more about Solutions](https://aka.ms/azuresentinelsolutionsdoc)

options.text: This Solution installs the data connector for Citrix ADC. You can get Citrix ADC Syslog data in your Microsoft Sentinel workspace. After installing the solution, configure and enable this data connector by following guidance in Manage solution view.

The Solution installs a parser that transforms the ingested data into Microsoft Sentinel normalized format. The normalized format enables better correlation of different types of data from different data sources to drive end-to-end outcomes seamlessly in security monitoring, hunting, incident investigation and response scenarios in Microsoft Sentinel.
